scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Package: Insurance Scheme For Health Workers Fighting COVID-19
description: This scheme provides insurance cover of Rs. 50 lakh for health workers involved in COVID-19 duties, including accidental death.
key_features: Covers public and private health workers
Includes accidental death due to COVID-19

criteria: Health workers including doctors, nurses, paramedics, and support staff involved in COVID-19 duties
Both public and private sector workers

special_notes: Extended multiple times during the pandemic
